verses.verse: And Ya`akov <WH3290> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto his sons <WH1121>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Gater yourselves together <WH622> <WH8734>, that I may tell <WH5046> <WH8686> you that which shall befall <WH7122> <WH8799> you in the last <WH319> days <WH3117>.
Gater yourselves together <WH6908> <WH8734>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, ye sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290>; and hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> your father <WH1>.

Re'uven <WH7205>, thou art my firstborn <WH1060>, my might <WH3581>, and the beginning <WH7225> of my strength <WH202>, the excellency <WH3499> of dignity <WH7613>, and the excellency <WH3499> of power <WH5794>:

Unstable <WH6349> as water <WH4325>, thou shalt not excel <WH3498> <WH8686>; because thou wentest up <WH5927> <WH8804> to thy father's <WH1> bed <WH4904>; then defiledst thou <WH2490> <WH8765> it: he went up <WH5927> <WH8804> to my couch <WH3326>.
SHim`on <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878> are brethren <WH251>; instruments <WH3627> of cruelty <WH2555> are in their habitations <WH4380>.

O my soul <WH5315>, come <WH935> <WH8799> not thou into their secret <WH5475>; unto their assembly <WH6951>, mine honour <WH3519>, be not thou united <WH3161> <WH8799>: for in their anger <WH639> they slew <WH2026> <WH8804> a man <WH376>, and in their selfwill <WH7522> they digged down <WH6131> <WH8765> a wall <WH7794>.

Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> be their anger <WH639>, for it was fierce <WH5794>; and their wrath <WH5678>, for it was cruel <WH7185> <WH8804>: I will divide <WH2505> <WH8762> them in Ya`akov <WH3290>, and scatter <WH6327> <WH8686> them in Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Y'hudah <WH3063>, thou art he whom thy brethren <WH251> shall praise <WH3034> <WH8686>: thy hand <WH3027> shall be in the neck <WH6203> of thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>; thy father's <WH1> children <WH1121> shall bow down <WH7812> <WH8691> before thee.

Y'hudah <WH3063> is a lion's <WH738> whelp <WH1482>: from the prey <WH2964>, my son <WH1121>, thou art gone up <WH5927> <WH8804>: he stooped down <WH3766> <WH8804>, he couched <WH7257> <WH8804> as a lion <WH738>, and as an old lion <WH3833>; who shall rouse him up <WH6965> <WH8686> ?

The sceptre <WH7626> shall not depart <WH5493> <WH8799> from Y'hudah <WH3063>, nor a Torahgiver <WH2710> <WH8781> from between his feet <WH7272>, until <WH3588> Shiloh <WH7886> come <WH935> <WH8799>; and unto him shall the gathering <WH3349> of the people <WH5971> be.

Binding <WH631> <WH8802> his foal <WH5895> unto the vine <WH1612>, and his ass's <WH860> colt <WH1121> unto the choice vine <WH8321>; he washed <WH3526> <WH8765> his garments <WH3830> in wine <WH3196>, and his clothes <WH5497> in the blood <WH1818> of grapes <WH6025>:
His eyes <WH5869> shall be red <WH2447> with wine <WH3196>, and his teeth <WH8127> white <WH3836> with milk <WH2461>.
Z'vulun <WH2074> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> at the haven <WH2348> of the sea <WH3220>; and he shall be for an haven <WH2348> of ships <WH591>; and his border <WH3411> shall be unto Zidon <WH6721>.
Yissakhar <WH3485> is a strong <WH1634> ass <WH2543> couching down <WH7257> <WH8802> between two burdens <WH4942>:

And he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that rest <WH4496> was good <WH2896>, and the land <WH776> that it was pleasant <WH5276> <WH8804>; and bowed <WH5186> <WH8799> his shoulder <WH7926> to bear <WH5445> <WH8800>, and became a servant <WH5647> <WH8802> unto tribute <WH4522>.
Dan <WH1835> shall judge <WH1777> <WH8799> his people <WH5971>, as one <WH259> of the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Dan <WH1835> shall be a serpent <WH5175> by the way <WH1870>, an adder <WH8207> in the path <WH734>, that biteth <WH5391> <WH8802> the horse <WH5483> heels <WH6119>, so that his rider <WH7392> <WH8802> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> backward <WH268>.
I have waited for <WH6960> <WH8765> thy salvation <WH3444>, O YY <WH3068>.
Gad <WH1410>, a troop <WH1416> shall overcome <WH1464> <WH8799> him: but he shall overcome <WH1464> <WH8799> at the last <WH6119>.
Out of Asher <WH836> his bread <WH3899> shall be fat <WH8082>, and he shall yield <WH5414> <WH8799> royal <WH4428> dainties <WH4574>.
Naftali <WH5321> is a hind <WH355> let loose <WH7971> <WH8803>: he giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> goodly <WH8233> words <WH561>.

Yosef <WH3130> is a fruitful <WH6509> <WH8802> bough <WH1121>, even a fruitful <WH6509> <WH8802> bough <WH1121> by a well <WH5869>; whose branches <WH1323> run <WH6805> <WH8804> over the wall <WH7791>:
The archers <WH1167> <WH2671> have sorely grieved him <WH4843> <WH8762>, and shot <WH7232> <WH8804> at him, and hated him <WH7852> <WH8799>:

But his bow <WH7198> abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in strength <WH386>, and the arms <WH2220> of his hands <WH3027> were made strong <WH6339> <WH8799> by the hands <WH3027> of the mighty <WH46> 'Elohim of Ya`akov <WH3290>; (from thence is the shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>, the stone <WH68> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:)

Havahn by the 'Elohim <WH410> of thy father <WH1>, who shall help <WH5826> <WH8799> thee; and by <WH854> 'El SHaddai <WH7706>, who shall bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee with b'rakhot <WH1293> of heaven <WH8064> above <WH5920>, b'rakhot <WH1293> of the deep <WH8415> that lieth <WH7257> <WH8802> under, b'rakhot <WH1293> of the breasts <WH7699>, and of the womb <WH7356>:

The b'rakhot <WH1293> of thy father <WH1> have prevailed <WH1396> <WH8804> above the b'rakhot <WH1293> of my progenitors <WH2029> <WH8802> unto the utmost bound <WH8379> of the everlasting <WH5769> hills <WH1389>: they shall be on the head <WH7218> of Yosef <WH3130>, and on the crown of the head <WH6936> of him that was separate <WH5139> from his brethren <WH251>.

Binyamin <WH1144> shall ravin <WH2963> <WH8799> as a wolf <WH2061>: in the morning <WH1242> he shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> the prey <WH5706>, and at night <WH6153> he shall divide <WH2505> <WH8762> the spoil <WH7998>.

All these are the twelve <WH6240> <WH8147> tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and this is it that their father <WH1> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> them; every <WH834> one <WH376> according to his b'rakhah <WH1293> he blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> them.

And he charged <WH6680> <WH8762> them, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I am to be gathered <WH622> <WH8737> unto my people <WH5971>: bury <WH6912> <WH8798> me with my fathers <WH1> in the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850>,

In the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Machpelah <WH4375>, which is before <WH6440> Mamre <WH4471>, in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, which Avraham <WH85> bought <WH7069> <WH8804> with the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850> for a possession <WH272> of a buryingplace <WH6913>.

There they buried <WH6912> <WH8804> Avraham <WH85> and Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>; there they buried <WH6912> <WH8804> Yitz'chak <WH3327> and Rebekah <WH7259> his wife <WH802>; and there I buried <WH6912> <WH8804> Leah <WH3812>.
The purchase <WH4735> of the field <WH7704> and of the cave <WH4631> that is therein was from the children <WH1121> of Heth <WH2845>.

And when Ya`akov <WH3290> had made an end <WH3615> <WH8762> of commanding <WH6680> <WH8763> his sons <WH1121>, he gathered up <WH622> <WH8799> his feet <WH7272> into the bed <WH4296>, and yielded up the ghost <WH1478> <WH8799>, and was gathered <WH622> <WH8735> unto his people <WH5971>.
